TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Screen extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a display device or multiple display devices on a single system.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此物件的建構函式不是公用的因此您無法明確建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen>物件。 當您呼叫它的公用方法時，會建立物件。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用各種方法和屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen>類別。 範例會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.AllScreens%2A>連線到系統的屬性，以擷取所有畫面的陣列。 針對每個傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen>，範例會加入裝置名稱、 範圍、 類型、 工作區和主要畫面<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。 若要使用的範例，請加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>至表單，然後再加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>按鈕的事件處理常式。
[!code-cpp[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllScreens As Screen()
public: static property cli::array <System::Windows::Forms::Screen ^> ^ AllScreens { cli::array <System::Windows::Forms::Screen ^> ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets an array of all displays on the system.
Docs.value: 類型的陣列，包含所有顯示在系統上的。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BitsPerPixel As Integer
public: property int BitsPerPixel { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of bits of memory, associated with one pixel of data.
Docs.value: 一個像素資料與相關聯的記憶體的位元數

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，每個螢幕的像素的位元數時，使用點陣圖。 如需有關點陣圖的詳細資訊，請參閱[類型的點陣圖](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Bounds As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle Bounds { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the bounds of the display.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeviceName As String
public: property System::String ^ DeviceName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the device name associated with a display.
Docs.value: 顯示相關聯的裝置名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個字串可能包含不可列印字元。

Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

Docs.param: The object to compare to this .
Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the specified object is equal to this .
Docs.returns: if the specified object is equal to this ; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.Screen FromControl(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control) cil managed

Docs.param: A for which to retrieve a .
Docs.summary: Retrieves a for the display that contains the largest portion of the specified control.
Docs.returns: A for the display that contains the largest region of the specified control. In multiple display environments where no display contains the control, the display closest to the specified control is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.Screen FromHandle(native int hwnd) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromHandle (hwnd As IntPtr) As Screen

Docs.param: The window handle for which to retrieve the .
Docs.summary: Retrieves a for the display that contains the largest portion of the object referred to by the specified handle.
Docs.returns: A for the display that contains the largest region of the object. In multiple display environments where no display contains any portion of the specified window, the display closest to the object is returned.
Docs.permission: 若要取得從 Win32 控制代碼的物件。 相關聯的列舉型別：

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.Screen FromPoint(valuetype System.Drawing.Point point) cil managed

Docs.param: A that specifies the location for which to retrieve a .
Docs.summary: Retrieves a for the display that contains the specified point.
Docs.returns: A for the display that contains the point. In multiple display environments where no display contains the point, the display closest to the specified point is returned.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.FromPoint%2A> 方法。 這個範例會建立<xref:System.Drawing.Point>參考<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>座標傳<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs>，然後使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.FromPoint%2A>方法，以判斷是否已按下點是在主畫面上。
[!code-cpp[Screen.FromPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen.FromPoint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Screen.FromPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen.FromPoint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Screen.FromPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen.FromPoint/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.Screen FromRectangle(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rect) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromRectangle (rect As Rectangle) As Screen

Docs.param: A that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a for the display that contains the largest portion of the rectangle.
Docs.returns: A for the display that contains the largest region of the specified rectangle. In multiple display environments where no display contains the rectangle, the display closest to the rectangle is returned.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the display.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle GetBounds(valuetype System.Drawing.Point pt) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetBounds (pt As Point) As Rectangle

Docs.param: A that specifies the coordinates for which to retrieve the display bounds.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the display that contains the specified point.
Docs.returns: A that specifies the bounds of the display that contains the specified point. In multiple display environments where no display contains the specified point, the display closest to the point is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle GetBounds(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rect) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetBounds (rect As Rectangle) As Rectangle

Docs.param: A that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the display that contains the largest portion of the specified rectangle.
Docs.returns: A that specifies the bounds of the display that contains the specified rectangle. In multiple display environments where no monitor contains the specified rectangle, the monitor closest to the rectangle is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle GetBounds(class System.Windows.Forms.Control ctl) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetBounds (ctl As Control) As Rectangle

Docs.param: The for which to retrieve the display bounds.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the display that contains the largest portion of the specified control.
Docs.returns: A that specifies the bounds of the display that contains the specified control. In multiple display environments where no display contains the specified control, the display closest to the control is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

Docs.summary: Computes and retrieves a hash code for an object.
Docs.returns: A hash code for an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作 <xref:System.Object> 方法。

Docs.summary: Retrieves the working area of a display.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle GetWorkingArea(valuetype System.Drawing.Point pt) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWorkingArea (pt As Point) As Rectangle

Docs.param: A that specifies the coordinates for which to retrieve the working area.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the working area closest to the specified point. The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.
Docs.returns: A that specifies the working area. In multiple display environments where no display contains the specified point, the display closest to the point is returned.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.PrimaryScreen%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.GetWorkingArea%2A>方法。 這個方法會要求包含名為按鈕的表單 `Button1`
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle GetWorkingArea(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rect) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWorkingArea (rect As Rectangle) As Rectangle

Docs.param: The that specifies the area for which to retrieve the working area.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the working area for the display that contains the largest portion of the specified rectangle. The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.
Docs.returns: A that specifies the working area. In multiple display environments where no display contains the specified rectangle, the display closest to the rectangle is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle GetWorkingArea(class System.Windows.Forms.Control ctl) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWorkingArea (ctl As Control) As Rectangle

Docs.param: The for which to retrieve the working area.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the working area for the display that contains the largest region of the specified control. The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.
Docs.returns: A that specifies the working area. In multiple display environments where no display contains the specified control, the display closest to the control is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Primary As Boolean
public: property bool Primary { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a particular display is the primary device.
Docs.value: 如果此顯示為主要。否則， 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PrimaryScreen As Screen
public: static property System::Windows::Forms::Screen ^ PrimaryScreen { System::Windows::Forms::Screen ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the primary display.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 對於單一顯示系統中，主顯示器也是唯一的顯示。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.PrimaryScreen%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.GetWorkingArea%2A>方法。 這個方法會要求包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScreenExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

Docs.summary: Retrieves a string representing this object.
Docs.returns: A string representation of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkingArea As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle WorkingArea { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the working area of the display. The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 工作區域是顯示、 工作列、 停駐的視窗和停駐的工具列排除桌面區域。
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Screen.WorkingArea%2A> 如果 Windows 工作列不論是否在工作列目前顯示或不設定為自動隱藏時，就會傳回整個螢幕區域。
